K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158a-0: @158a 'phags pa parna sha ba ri'i mdo; dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158a-1: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158a-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158a-4: b'a ma ne tv'am na ma shya mi tv'am na ma sy'a mi b'a ma ne bha ga wa ti pi sh'a tsi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158a-6: pi sh'a ci p'a sha pa ra shuddh'a ri n'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158a-7: ya ni ka ni cid bha y'a pa dyam ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158b-0: ye ke na cid @158b au pa dra bha:ye ke tsid a'u p'a y'a s'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158b-1: ye ke tsid aa dhya a'atmi k'a bha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158b-2: ye ke tsid au pa yargga au pa sargga sam baddh'a b'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158b-7: ae bod paryante na pandi ta ta: tad nee na sa tya ba tsa ne na sa tya b'akka na: tadya th'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158b-8: aom dza:dza:dza:dza:ae bhi sha: pandi ta aa dhishthi tee ra mantra pa de ra ma ma sarba satv'a n'anytsa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158b-9: raksham ku ru ba ri tra nam ku ru /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158b-10: ba ri gra ham ku ru /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158b-11: pa ri p'a la nam ku ru /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158b-12: sh'antim ku ru sva satya ya nam ku ru /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158b-13: danda pa ri h'a ram ku ru /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158b-14: shasta pa ri h'a ram ku ru /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158b-15: y'a bad ba shidtu sha nam ku ru aagnam pa ra h'i ram ku ru /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158b-16: au da ka pa ri h'am ku ru; ka kho rda tshtshe da ni ku ru s'i m'am bam dham ku ru /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158b-17: dh'a ra ni bandham ku ru /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158b-19: aa mi te aa mi te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158b-20: aa mi te de bha be /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158b-21: aa mi ta sam bha be /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158b-23: aa sva stam ge m'a ma ra m'a ma ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158b-24: m'a sa ra m'a sa ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158b-26: au pa sa ma sarba by'a dh'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158b-27: nu ba sa ma sarba aa k'a la mri tyu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158b-28: nu pa sa ma sarba naksha tra gra ha dosh'a nu pa sa ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158b-34: bi tyum na bi tyum na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158b-35: tu na tu na tu mu la sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158b-36: aom goo ri gandha r'i tso ri tsand'a li m'a tam gi pukka si sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158b-37: na ma: sarba sha ba r'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158b-38: ma h'a sha ba r'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158b-39: bha ga ba ti pi sh'a tsi parnna sha ba ri sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158b-40: aom pi sh'a tsi parnna sha ba ri hr'i:dza:h'um phat pi sh'a tsi sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:158b-43: ku ra re parnna sha ba ri sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:159a-0: gnag nad la srad bu byas te brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas @159a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:159a-1: shing mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad du mdud de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:159a-2: sngags kyi snying po bris pa'i snod dang bcas pas bzlas pa tshul bzhin du byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:159a-5: ba lang la sogs pa la spos chus bkrus nas khyu mchog kyang bkrus te de'i mgo la bcings na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:159a-7: de bzhin du ma he dang ra lug rnams la gnod pa byung ba la yang lhas su bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:159a-8: bum pa chu gtsang mas bkang ste brgya rtsa brgyad du bsngags nas bkrus na zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:159a-9: snga dro phyugs kyi lhas su song la dri dang me tog gi gtor ma byas te bum pa gsar pa ma spyad pa chus bkang la brgya rtsa brgyad du bsngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:159a-10: phyugs lhas kyi sgor rta babs gzugs shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:159a-11: rta babs de la chu shing gi lo ma la rig pa gi wang gis bris te rta babs kyi khar gdags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:159a-12: de nas phyugs thams cad zas la song ba rta babs kyi sgo de nas gzung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:159a-13: gzhan yang bum pa bzhi chus bkang ste brgya rtsa brgyad du bsngags nas mi bzhis chus gtor na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:159a-15: de bzhin du zhag bdun du byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:159a-16: nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:159a-17: mi nad dang phyugs nad la gro ga la bris te mchod pa byas nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la gdags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:159b-0: stag gi 'jigs pa la dril bu la bzlas nas @159b dkrol par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:159b-1: chu srin gyi 'jigs pa la mda' dang pha gu la bsngags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:159b-4: sdig pa la sogs pa rnams kyang kha bcings par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:159b-5: g-yul ngor thal ba la bsngags te spyi bo dang mgul du byugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:159b-6: mtshon cha zlog par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:159b-7: skud pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pas nad pa'i khri la bcing ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:159b-8: bum pa la brgya rtsa brgyad du bsngags pas khrus bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:159b-9: lag pa'i skud pa la bzlas nas bcing ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:159b-11: yul bskor te dril bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:159b-13: dung la bzlas pa byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:159b-14: bgegs thams cad 'byer te gnod pa'ang zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:159b-15: skyes bu dpa' bo'i dpral bar rig pa'i mdongs bzhag la mtshon cha bskur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-008:159b-17: 'phags pa parnna sha ba ri'i mdo rdzogs so ////
